xml:
Liquid
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 15 (scalp lotion only) - Caution: flammable. Keep your body away from fire or flames after you have put on the medicine

Label 28 - Spread thinly on the affected skin only

Excipients

May contain

Cetostearyl alcohol (including cetyl and stearyl alcohol), hydroxybenzoates (parabens)

Betacap 0.1% scalp application <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Dermal Laboratories Ltd)</ph> 29911000001103

Betamethasone (as Betamethasone valerate) 1 mg per 1 gram

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £3.19

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £3.19

Betnovate 0.1% lotion <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(GlaxoSmithKline UK Ltd)</ph> 3746611000001107

Betamethasone (as Betamethasone valerate) 1 mg per 1 gram

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £4.58

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £4.58

Betnovate 0.1% scalp application <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(GlaxoSmithKline UK Ltd)</ph> 766211000001108

Betamethasone (as Betamethasone valerate) 1 mg per 1 gram

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £4.99

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £3.19

Diprosone 0.05% lotion <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Merck Sharp & Dohme Ltd)</ph> 4023711000001108

Betamethasone (as Betamethasone dipropionate) 500 microgram per 1 ml

  • 30 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £2.73

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £2.73

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £7.80

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £7.80

BETAMETHASONE
